p: Substances of plant origin, belonging to the most diverse chemical classes, have already demonstrated proven anti-inflammatory activity [ 9]. Among them, alkaloids, terpenes [ 81, 82, 83, 84], and phenolic compounds such as tannins, lignans, coumarins, saponins, and especially the flavonoids stand out [ 83, 84, 85, 86, 87, 88, 89] ( Figure 1).
